The Kazakhstan Volleyball Federation (KVF; ) is the governing body for volleyball in Kazakhstan. It was founded in 1992, and has been a member of FIVB. It is also a member of the Asian Volleyball Confederation. The VFRK is responsible for organizing the men's and women's national volleyball team.
National teams
For details please refer to main articles for dedicated teams.
